topic.title: where can i find a USA covid vaccine certificate to print out?
topic.body: i don't want to get vaccined, but i need it, please help

1620620160_1FmrBebnM1t99pE6rz9amgdgFSfKa.body:
> [anonymouslogin](#comment_282_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): What do you need the certificate for?

i just need it for my family to stop wanting me to vaccine, specially my wife, she won't quit...
